alternativeNames: 红莲之罪：转生成为女骑士
author: 레몬개구리, 쌀숲, 야샌
description: Kasia Del Roman is a soldier crafted to become an assassin. She lost her human emotions long ago and lived her life as a simple tool, just to be thrown away in her final moments. She couldn't even die a proper death as she opened her eyes to a battlefield of a different world. Will she live the same life she did in her original world?
